messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elvis, was pet search (huh?!)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I m dating myself, again (and confessing how out-of-touch with the world I ve always been....) but I don t remember Elvis, let alone had a crush on
messages.messageBody:
12/23/02 13:03:

> Oh Brenda, a walk down memory lane, how nice that would be. I assume you
> didn't really mean "junk" now did you???!!! That little girl crush I had on
> him never went away.
> And it is about the only one I've ever had.

Well, I'm dating myself, again (and confessing how out-of-touch with the
world I've always been....) but I don't remember Elvis, let alone had a
crush on him. Oh well.

And actually, Mary, yes, I did mean junk. Amazing junk. And some fairly
nice stuff, I'm sure, but lots of junk, too. Let's face it, Friedberg isn't
exactly on the tourist route. Gotta exploit what you got!

brenda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elvis, was pet search (huh?!)
messages.messageBody:
>From: Alan & Brenda Leonard <abtleo@...>

<<I didn't know you were a big Elvis freak. Send me an address sometime and
I'll send you some pictures from Ray Barracks, Friedberg, Germany. My dh is
now stationed where Elvis was stationed when he was in the army. There's
Elvis junk all over this town. And, in typical army fashion, NOTHING here
has changed in the least since 20 years before Elvis was here, let alone
since then!>>


Oh Brenda, a walk down memory lane, how nice that would be. I assume you
didn't really mean "junk" now did you???!!! That little girl crush I had on
him never went away.
And it is about the only one I've ever had.

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Elvis, was pet search (huh?!)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Gee, Mary, I didn t know you were a big Elvis freak.  Send me an address sometime and I ll send you some pictures from Ray Barracks, Friedberg, Germany.
messages.messageBody:
12/22/02 20:01:

> Hey!!! Don't make fun of Elvis!! I LOVE Elvis. In fact I'm looking at him
> right now on my calender. I also have a doll of him in my room. The kids
> want to play with him from time to time, but NO ONE touches my Elvis
> doll!!!!
>
> Mary B (long live the king)

Gee, Mary,

I didn't know you were a big Elvis freak. Send me an address sometime and
I'll send you some pictures from Ray Barracks, Friedberg, Germany. My dh is
now stationed where Elvis was stationed when he was in the army. There's
Elvis junk all over this town. And, in typical army fashion, NOTHING here
has changed in the least since 20 years before Elvis was here, let alone
since then!

brenda
